security: The message discusses contact with a potential asset (Buenaventura Francesco Dellunde y Puyans) and assesses his potential for "PBRUMEN OPS value." Revealing this interaction could compromise the individual, expose covert operational methods, and damage relationships with entities like the Rome Hilton who are providing ODACID cover.
summary: A message regarding Buenaventura Francesco Dellunde y Puyans, a Cuban national and credit manager at the Rome Hilton, who is assessed as a potential asset for KUBARK operations, with a meeting held to gather leads and information.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET/RYBAT message, dated February 2, 1965, details information on Buenaventura Francesco Dellunde y Puyans, a Cuban national and credit manager at the Rome Hilton, who is considered a potential asset for KUBARK operations. Rome Station maintains infrequent contact with Dellunde under ODACID cover and while assessed as willing to aid KUBARK, his potential for PBRUMEN OPS value is doubted based on experiences up to March 1964. A meeting on January 16, 1965, with Dellunde, Bunce, and Growery, led to Dellunde providing operational leads and information, leaving the KUBARKers with an excellent first impression.
title: Information on Buenaventura Francesco Dellunde y Puyans
